sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - உழு, யோசி, உழுகிறவன், ஒன்றும் சொல்லாதிரு, வேலை செய்பவன். மவுனமாயிரு, செவிடாய்ப்போ, பதிந்திரு, பிணை, பேசமாலிரு, அடக்கிவை, சும்மாயிரு, ஒபாமல் வேண்டு, அடக்கிக்கொள், அமர்ந்திரு, காதுகேளாதவனாயிரு, எத்தனம்பண்ணு
(1) to cut in, to plow, to engrave, to devise
(2) to be silent, to be dumb, to be speechless, to be deaf
1) to be silent, to keep quiet
3) to be deaf, to show deafness

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to scratch, that is, (by implication) to engrave, plough; hence (from the use of tools) to fabricate (of any material); figuratively to devise (in a bad sense); hence (from the idea of secrecy) to be silent, to let alone; hence (by implication) to be deaf (as an accompaniment of dumbness): - X altogether, cease, conceal, be deaf, devise, ear, graven, imagine, leave off speaking, hold peace, plow (-er, -man), be quiet, rest, practise secretly, keep silence, be silent, speak not a word, be still, hold tongue, worker.
Cognate: H2758, H2790, H2791, H2794, H2795, H2796, H2798, H2799, H4281, H4282
